title: Strictly Come Dancing, week three: who had the best technical chops?
text:
Who brought the dazzle of Hollywood to Strictly? Dance expert Marianka Swain gives her verdict

My Oscar winners for Movie Week were Kelvin Fletcher, Michelle Visage and Catherine Tyldesley. Though Fletcher didn’t land the clean routine suggested by nabbing this year’s first 10s, with some lift hiccups, he excelled in both the Charleston basics (strong "swivel" foot action) and high-flying Mary Poppins characterisation.

Visage channelled Cabaret’s Liza Minnelli not just in look and attitude, but by skilfully physicalising the musical accents. In her Quickstep, she maintained a calm hold while moving with ease, though needs to keep her shoulders down and stretch her legs when dancing backwards,...
description: Who brought the dazzle of Hollywood to Strictly?
